docs.text: Dr. Yulai Xie (谢 雨来) Senior Researcher @ Hitachi China Research Lab. Research Area Machine learning Computer vision Crowd simulation Traffic analysis Education 2004-2010 Bachelor and Master (engineering) @ Tianjin Univ., China 2010-2014 Ph.D (engineering) @ Hokkaido Univ. with CSC scholarship, Japan Experience 2014-2022 Hitachi China Research Lab. Publications Xie, Yulai, Zhang,Yang, Ren, Fang.:Temporal-enhanced graph convolution network for skeleton-based action recognition. IET Comput.Vis.1–14 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1049/cvi2.12086 Awards (Under construction)
